title: 'Glad to have tried this'
body: I suffer from ibs and had a hard time with dryness and dullness in my hair. Earlier used shampoos like khadi and loreal those didn't seem to do anything good for my hair. This one i chose because i wanted a less harsh shampoo but also would clean my hair and assist with some growth. So, this Love Beauty & Planet Onion Oil, Blackseed Oil & Patchouli Sulfate Free Hairfall Control Shampoo does seem to be gentler on my hair and most of all I am happy that after only one application of shampoo it cleans my oil massaged scalp. But, it is not the best yet because it doesn't help me get my hair straight like they used to be a long time ago. I don't like the frizziness I have been experiencing these past 1-2 years and this shampoo doesn't solve that problem which I guess doesn't come under its job description and I might need some other hair products as well.

title: 'Love and beauty'

title: 'Worst shampoo you could ever use!'
body: This product is a big rip off. Let alone its claims of being environment friendly, it doesn't even qualify to be called a shampoo. It can be better called a detergent. The moment you start using it, the results are almost immediate. Hair starts drying like crazy, loses all shine, silkiness and texture and becomes almost like animal mane - rough, dry and spiky to look at. And the hair fall happens in clusters. It took me a while to realize the damage it was doing and by then I was halfway through the second bottle. Because come on, who would think that an expensive so called vegan shampoo you got at triple the price of normal drugstore shampoos is the root cause of your sudden hair problems! Once realization hit I stopped using it and my hair texture started getting better little by little but all that hair fall has forced me to see a doctor to reverse it. Imagine shelling out 650 bucks and inviting so much trouble!!. Save your money and most importantly your precious hair and stay away from this detergent! The people behind this nasty product must be sued.

title: 'Love the brand and the quality of product'
body: 'I have been using love beauty and planet products (shampoo and conditioner) for sometime. This is my third purchase. Below are the Pros 1) Suitable for curly and frizzy hair 2) Suitable for color treated/ henna applied hair 3) Comes in big bottles halves the time in reordering and reduces plastic waste. 4) They pack in recyclable plastic which is good for the planet. Cons: So far none. Please keep up the good work to the customers as well as planet.'
